title: Expedites appeals of sex offense convictions when such offense was committed or attempted against a person under 18
summary: Expedites perfection and hearing of appeals of violent sex offense convictions when such offense was committed or attempted to be committed against person under 18; such appeals shall be perfected within 60 days of the filing of the notice of appeal and heard within 120 days of the filing of the notice of appeal; prohibits the ordering of recognizance or bail upon conviction of any felony sex offense when such offense was committed or attempted to be committed against a person under 18 years of age.

         issuance  of  an order of recognizance or bail to certain persons upon
         conviction of a sex offense and expediting the perfection  of  appeals
